author: nd
msg: just a typo (but automatically spread over the docs :-)

author: stoddard
msg: Remove this patch ported earlier from 2.1:
"Do not bypass output filters when redirecting subrequests internally.
PR: 17629 (Port of nd's patch from Apache 2.1)"
General concensus is that this patch, while it fixes the reported problem
runs a high risk of introducing other more serious bugs. We need to
spend some more time exploring alternative fixes.

author: wrowe
msg: A few for consideration; with clean patches to make life easy.

author: wrowe
msg: Drop SSL_set_state() in favor of a proper SSL_renegotiate() to begin
rehandshaking the SSL connection, vis-a-vis ApacheSSL.

author: wrowe
msg: Drop archiac notes - no special steps required once we test for ENGINE_init()
